short_summary: Public show case and dissemination of the quiet vessel initiative (QVI) research results
description: The Quiet Vessel Initiative (QVI) has been funding studies on promising technologies and vessel designs to reduce noise from vessels.
duration_in_months: You will have only 15 days to complete this project
full_summary:
***Public Showcase and Dissemination of Quiet Vessel Initiative (QVI) Research Results***

**Tender Reference:** cb-672-60186240

**Publication Date:** November 29, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** December 14, 2023, 14:00:00

Transport Canada seeks a contractor to develop a public showcase and dissemination of research results from the Quiet Vessel Initiative (QVI). The initiative has funded research and development projects since 2019, with a focus on testing promising technologies, vessel designs, retrofits, and operational practices to make vessels quieter. This public showcase aims to make the results of these projects more widely available to various partners, academia, and industry.

**Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

**Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)

**Trade Agreements:** This tender is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Contracting Entity:** Transport Canada

**Contact Information:** Meranda Hodgson, meranda.hodgson@tc.gc.ca, 343596-5539

**Notice URL:** Not applicable

**Attachments:** [List relevant attachments]

**Tender Description:** The contractor will develop a public showcase and dissemination of QVI research results. This will include articles, micro-sites, newsletters, and other materials. The showcase will be done via electronic means (websites, social media, newsletters, etc.) and optionally through news outlets and trade press. The public showcase will include all projects funded through QVI, as well as other research pillars from Transport Canada's marine group.

**Selection Criteria:** Not applicable

**Amendment:** None

**Solicitation Number:** T8080-230359
**Previous solicitation numbers:** T8080-231245CB*. *
Procurement Method: Pre-identified supplier clause.
Selection Criteria: N/A
